title: Mask
description: The creation of wooden sculptures began with making props for the band Chelson Wells.
context: The creation of wooden sculptures began with making props for the band Chelson Wells. Chelson Wells is the name of a new imaginary world in our planetary system. The gate provides access to the authentic world and is decorated by the three explorers: the Shaman (JVEM), the leader (SAVME), and the Seer (AVJ).

images.alt: Wooden mask with a lamp inside.
Wooden mask with a lamp inside.
Wooden mask with a scorpion on it.
Stage piece with the wooden masks on it, between which a banner is stretched with 'Chelson Wells' written on it.
